policyDefinition:
policy
 app-visibility
 flow-visibility
 lists
  prefix-list InfrastructureRoutes
   ip-prefix 100.0.0.0/8 le 32
   ip-prefix 172.0.0.0/8 le 32
  !
 !
 route-policy denyInfraRoutes
  sequence 10
   match
    address InfrastructureRoutes
   !
   action reject
   !
  !
  default-action accept
 !
!
